title: Antique Polki & Ruby Floral Drop Earrings
features: These striking earrings showcase the timeless beauty of uncut Polki diamonds set in a contemporary geometric frame. The antique Hyderabadi polish adds a touch of old-world charm. A vibrant, round-cut ruby, surrounded by smaller polki diamonds in a floral pattern, creates a captivating contrast. The unique setting style enhances the natural brilliance of each gemstone.
occasions: or a modern twist on traditional occasions like a half-saree function (Voni Function).
